attributes.action: force all UK based companies offering an online service to accept BFPO as a valid postcode.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that all online companies should recognise a BFPO address as a valid postcode.  Those posted abroad often change their banking details so cannot order anything online to be posted to them.  BFPO is for some reason still not recognised as a valid postcode (not only via these means), despite thousands of UK and commonwealth citizens using one on a day to day basis.  This needs to change.
